page.title: 10CRANFORD COMMUNITY SCHOOL
page.content: the creche. One is a mother, who has worked as a helper for two years. The creche is run every day from 9:30 to 12:30 and there are thirty children on the register. The day we visited the creche to interview the helpers, parents and children, they were having a Fancy Dress Competition. Usually the children play in the sand-pit, with toys and do painting. While the children are in the creche, their mothers know that they are safe and they can do some kind of sport or continue their education. The school also runs a playgroup. In the playgroup there are 25 children whose mothers pay for each session. During the morning, the children are provided with a small bottle of milk and a biscuit and always have a story before they go home. The staff and parents raise money through raffles and fetes
